thread.title: George Clooney says fatherhood will be ‘an adventure’ | Page Six
thread.title_full: George Clooney says fatherhood will be ‘an adventure’ | Page Six

author: Jessica Sager
title: George Clooney says fatherhood will be ‘an adventure’ | Page Six
text:
George Clooney opened up for the first time about expecting twins with wife Amal .
“We are really happy and really excited,” a smiling Clooney, 55, told French TV show “Rencontres de Cinema” in a sit-down that aired Sunday night.
“It’s going to be an adventure,” he said. “We’ve sort of embraced it all … with arms wide open.”
The Oscar winner also said that his friends were “very supportive” when he revealed the news, though they still had a few chuckles at his expense.
“Then it got really quiet, and they all just started making baby crying noises,” he said. “And the whole table just busted up laughing.”
One thing that doesn’t concern Clooney about fatherhood is his age, noting that French actor Jean-Paul Belmondo was 70 when he welcomed his second child with wife Nathalie Tardivel in 2003.
“So, I’m feeling a little better about being 56 by the time [the twins are born].”
